import sys
import math

# # Turn of Garbage collection. For speed up in program.
# import gc;
# gc.disable();

def calcD(n):
    val = 0
    while n > 0:
        r = n % 10;
        if (r % 2 == 0):
            val += r * 2
        else:
            val += r
        n/=10
    return val%10;
    

def cn(n):
    sum = 0
    while(n % 10 != 0 and n > 0):
        sum += calcD(n-1)
        n-=1;
    return n/10 * 45 + sum;

t = input()
for i in range(t):
    a, b = map(int, raw_input().split(' '))
    print cn(b+1) - cn(a);
